name: Avocado, Uni & Pineapple
description:
The couple Mr. Siamese Cat and Ms. Gold Fish are mysteriously trapped in their own room. Unfortunately, the power goes on and off in the neighborhood because of construction. Wait, I think they are not the only ones in the room. Help them escape! 

How to Play: 

Keyboard

WSAD to move Player 1

Z to interact

X to continue the conversation/submit

TGFH to move Player 2

V to interact

B to continue the conversation/submit

Arcade

Up/Down/Left/Right to move Player 1

Button 1 to interact

Button 2 to continue the conversation/submit

Up/Down/Left/Right to move Player 2

Button 1 to interact

Button 2 to continue the conversation/submit
